job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <strong>Job ID: TYA956947 <br><br></strong><strong>Job Title: Machine Learning Engineer <br><br></strong><strong>Duration: 12 Month<br><br></strong><strong>Location: Plano, TX<br><br></strong><strong>Company Background: </strong>Our client, a major employer in the area, is looking for a <strong>Machine Learning Engineer </strong>to be part of its team in its North American operations.<br><br><strong><u>Notes<br><br></u></strong><strong>Description:<br></strong><ul><li>Migrating to cloud AWS (EC2 and S3). Will work with Data Science team. Need to fill gap b/w Data Scientist and Engineers, transitioning from SAAS to Python.</li><li>Most of the data that team uses is in Snowflake repository.</li><li>Will work on Client Ops/DevOps Practices.</li><li>3-5 years exp, extensively hands-on individual</li><li>Needs to be an expert to pass on the knowledge to rest of the team on DevOps/MLOps Responsibilities:</li><li>Use statistical and machine learning techniques to create scalable analytics solutions within the auto finance space</li><li>Establish scalable, efficient, automated processes for large scale data analysis, model development, model validation and model implementation</li><li>Drive adoption of best practices across the Data Science organizations</li><li>Design and architect modular and reusable code both for use in experiments as well as production environments</li><li>Deliver production-ready code</li><li>Work with the broader Data Science to define the KPIs for machine learning projects</li><li>Provide technical/team guidance and training/mentorship</li><li>Stay abreast of developments in research methodology and changing technologies in the marketplace and proactively identify applications of these latest developments to improve existing methods</li><li>Prepare and present findings to both technical and non-technical audiences<br></li></ul><strong><u>Requirements<br><br></u></strong><strong>Qualifications:</strong><ul><li>BA/BS degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Information Technology or related disciplines</li><li>Experience with cloud-native architecture and container orchestration (particularly Docker and Kubernetes) preferred.</li><li>5+ years of production experience working in Data Science, Machine Learning or Software Engineering</li><li>Experience utilizing Github in the Machine Learning pipeline for best practice code management and collaboration</li><li>Solid production experience using Python (including NumPy), PySpark and SQL</li><li>Production experience with Apache Spark</li><li>Strong fundamentals in problem solving, algorithm design and complexity analysis</li><li>Hands-on experience with web APIs, CI/CD for Machine Learning </li><li>Experience implementing Machine Learning pipelines in production environments is a plus</li><li>Experience working with data science within the financial service space is a plus</li></ul>
